text: @realDonaldTrump @OANN You should order to wrap the white house in tin foil & go hide in the bunker. Anti-Fa(scist) scanners are tuned to you w/5G compliant COVID-19 broadcasted Socialist anti-vaccine. You should also keep an eye on the shifty little Miller guy, he might be in on it. Also chemtrails.
